name: IT Support Services by Cardonet Ltd
overview:
IT Support Services By Cardonet at Cardonet, we make IT happen.

And that’s not just a clever slogan - it’s the central pillar of our service ethos, and we apply it to everything we do. From forgotten passwords to 3am server emergencies, from office moves to data centre design - our approach is always the same - whatever you need, we will make IT happen. That attitude was what we passionately believed in when we first started out in 1999, with our two directors rolling up their sleeves and carrying out most client work themselves. We have a much bigger team now of course, but on most days you can still find our directors at a client’s site doing what they continue to believe in as passionately as ever – making IT happen.
